posts.title: 5 Tips to Extend Your Refrigerator's Life
posts.excerpt: Simple maintenance steps you can take today to prevent costly repairs later.
posts.content:
Your refrigerator is the hardest working appliance in your home. It runs 24/7. Here are 5 tips to keep it running smoothly:

  • Clean the condenser coils every 6 months.
  • Check the door seals for gaps.
  • Keep the temperature between 37-40Â°F.
  • Don't overstuff it - air needs to circulate.
  • Change the water filter regularly.

If you notice it running loud or not cooling, call us immediately!
